org.extremecomponents.table.core
Interface Registry

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractRegistry
public interface Registry

The Registry holds all the parameters, whether specific to the table actions, or user defined. The methods closely match the servlet spec on purpose.

Author:
Jeff Johnston
